## Tile.resetVisibilityCounter() method

Reset the visibility counter. This will force the visibility check to be rerun on all objects in this `Tile`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resetVisibilityCounter(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
